links.title: China-U.S. to Resume Trade Talks After Tit-for-Tat Tariff Battle
links.description: China will dispatch Vice Commerce Minister Wang Shouwen to the U.S. for trade talks in late August, the first official exchanges since earlier negotiations broke down two months ago. The Chinese delegation led by Wang will meet with an American group led by David Malpass, under secretary of the Department

messages.body: $AAPL https://iphone.appleinsider.com/articles/18/08/15/watch-apple-parks-massive-motorized-cafeteria-doors-open-in-this-video

links.title: Watch Apple Park's massive motorized cafeteria doors open in this video
links.description: Apple CEO Tim Cook shared a rare glimpse at Apple Park's inner workings on Wednesday with a video showing off the facility's cafeteria doors, two massive, motorized floor-to-ceiling glass panels that slide open for natural building ventilation. Cook presented the time lapse video in a tweet, saying, "Lunchtime at Apple Park just got a whole lot more exciting."

links.title: Asian shares set to decline after Wall Street falls on tech losses
links.description: The U.S. markets overall saw a dip overnight, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average losing 137.51 points and closing 0.54 percent lower at 25,162.41. The Nasdaq Composite declined 1.23 percent to end at 7,774.12 and the S&P 500 finished the session lower by 0.76 percent at 2,818.37.
